programme.desc: Sebuah program pertandingan masakan di antara pelawak dan selebriti berentap bagi menambat hati juri. Dihoskan oleh Datuk Chef Wan, rancangan ini pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga.

programme.title: Kiah Pi Jepun
programme.desc: Kiah bercuti ke Jepun dan mendapat tawaran untuk meluaskan lagi perniagaan Ikan Pekasam. Namun pelbagai rintangan harus dilaluinya untuk berjaya menembusi pasaran Jepun.

programme.title: Cakap Melayu Lah! - EP 3

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar S2 - EP 2

programme.title: Boss Kira - EP 3

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 5

programme.title: Gado Gado 2 - EP 7

programme.title: Resipi Nenek - EP 8

programme.title: Ngaroot - EP 9

programme.title: Komediri - EP 2
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan 'Stand Up Comedy' yang mempersembahkan 3 pelawak dan di hoskan oleh Harith Iskander.

programme.title: Michael Ang's Halal Kitchen - EP 10

programme.title: Tak Kot - EP 1

programme.title: Miss Lawak - EP 3

programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Movie - Kadugu - EP 1
programme.desc: A man goes up against corrupt and powerful people to avenge the crime committed against a child.

programme.title: Movie - Uthamma Villain - EP 1
programme.desc: Manoranjan, a superstar, is counting his last days due to brain tumor. How he goes about his final wish of doing a comedy film with his mentor Margadarsi forms the crux of the story.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Ranguski - EP 1
programme.desc: A police constable becomes the prime suspect in the murder of a woman. With the mysterious killer intent on making him the scapegoat, can he clear his name?

programme.title: Movie - House Owner - EP 1
programme.desc: Elderly couple Vasu and Radha, deeply in love, struggle when Vasu, a former army officer, is diagnosed with Alzheimer's, forcing Radha to cope with his changing behavior.

programme.title: Movie - Jadaa - EP 1
programme.desc: Jada, a rising football star, abandons his ambitions to join a violent local tournament and avenge the death of his hero, Sethu.

programme.title: Movie - Poovizhi Vasalile - EP 1
programme.desc: A man, depressed by the death of his family, adopts a boy with hearing and speech difficulty and names him after his dead son. The boy, who has seen the killers of his widowed mother, is in danger.

programme.title: Movie - Zombie Reddy - EP 1
programme.desc: Mario, a game developer, and his friends, get caught up in the rivalry between two families and a mysterious zombie attack in Rayalaseema where they go to attend a friend's wedding

programme.title: Movie - Pattathu Yaanai - EP 1
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant business. However, their plans get interrupted when he gets an order from a local gangster but falls for his girlfriend, Aishwarya.

programme.title: Movie - Theerkatharisi - EP 1
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger repeatedly calls the police control room, tipping them off about impending crimes and accidents.

programme.title: Movie - Sowkarpettai - EP 1
programme.desc: Driven by vengeance, spectral lovers return from the afterlife to haunt and punish the villains responsible for their untimely demise in a spectral reckoning.

programme.title: Movie - Thiruttu Payale 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, under orders from a senior official, records conversations of elite professionals. While on duty, he discovers an online sociopath and decides to reveal his identity.

programme.title: Movie - Kayal - EP 1
programme.desc: A guy falls in love with a girl at first sight. When the girl develops feelings for the guy, he departs. Are they destined to meet again?

programme.title: Movie - Savarakathi - EP 1
programme.desc: A barber has a bad encounter with a gangster on the road and this results in him running all over the city to save himself.

programme.title: Movie - Manjapai - EP 1
programme.desc: An aged villager comes to the city and sets people right.

programme.title: Movie - House Full - EP 1
programme.desc: When a bomb is placed inside a theatre during a show, the owner has to decide if he should go against the cops and empty the theatre. Instead, the cops want to defuse it without informing the viewers.

programme.title: Movie - Bhale Khiladi - EP 1
programme.desc: Bhale Bhale Magadivoy (transl.?You are an interesting man) is a 2015 Indian Telugu-language romantic comedy film written and directed by Maruthi.

programme.title: Movie - Sindhubaadh - EP 1
programme.desc: Thiru, a crook, marries Venba before she leaves for Malaysia. However, his world unravels when her father sells her into the skin trade.

programme.title: Movie - 16 Vayadhinile - EP 1
programme.desc: The movie revolves around the struggle and vulnerability of 16-year old Mayil (Sridevi) when in love.

programme.title: Movie - Kaari - EP 1
programme.desc: Sethu, a champion jockey, SRK, a multimillionaire and Meena, a simple village girl cross paths in a village race, where a horse jockey is training a ferocious Jallikattu bull. Will fate take care of Meena's future and Sethu's life.

programme.title: Movie - Kalavani 2 - EP 1

programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 17
programme.desc: Rising sea-levels are one of the consequences of climate change that will change the map of the world. Different countries are trying to adapt, using varied strategies. From Shanghai to Tuvalu, from megacities to tiny islands, we visit some of the most vulnerable coastlines and the solutions they have invented.

programme.desc: A man is murdered during a reenactment of the Battle of the Marne organised by him. Lieutenant Karine Lelievre and Captain Isabelle Guercher are tasked with the investigation. Unfortunately, they are sworn enemies... The case gets more complicated when they discover that the murder is linked to their shared past.

programme.desc: An immersive visit to Portland, Oregon. Since the 1970s, the city has been championing progressive and avant-garde ideas. Marc-Andre meets the founder of Growing Gardens, takes a look at community farming and social initiatives, and meets a pastor, the happy owner of a non-profit bar.

programme.desc: Crises, coups, wars, transnational threats, outside interference, global warming: the stability of Africa and the safety of the civil populations are in danger. Via twenty words, the political scientist Niagale Bagayoko analyses the current security challenges and dynamics.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Seul
programme.desc: November 2000. Yves Parlier is about to set off in the Vendee Globe. This non-stop, unassisted, single-handed round the world race is the perfect opportunity to match your childhood heroes. But it's more than a race. It's an incredible test of endurance and survival.

programme.title: Sauver Les Oceans
programme.desc: Special program to mark the United Nations Conference on the Oceans.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 11
programme.desc: Julien heads off to meet Audrey and Michael, who settled in the Yukon in an off-grid yurt with their three young children. He discovers the family's daily routine, a life filled with challenges and all the ingenuity necessary to overcome them.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 7
programme.desc: Cecil Bazin, zoo director, is found dead in the cheetah enclosure. Despite the bite marks, it wasn't a cheetah that killed her. Had someone wanted to make it look like an accident by letting one of the big cats into the enclosure when it should have spent the night indoors?

programme.title: Tandem - EP 8
programme.desc: Fishermen surprise Julien, Alice's boyfriend, cleaning-up a crime scene at the port. Everything points to him as the one who killed his friend Mickael. Lea tries desperately to get Julien to explain, but he refuses to say anything. Why would he have attacked someone he considered as a brother?

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 7
programme.desc: Before becoming a painter Pierre Sojo had a passion for drawing as an art in its own right. Today his drawings also serve as preparatory sketches prior to his painting.

programme.title: La Mediterranee N'est Pas Morte
programme.desc: 'If we do nothing, in twenty years, the Mediterranean will be a dead sea!'': this phrase by Jacques-Yves Cousteau was uttered in 1979. Forty-five years later, despite a certain amount of progress, his observation remains just as valid. Has the battle been lost? Franck Lorrain investigates.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: La Sirene
programme.desc: 1980, in southern Iran. The people of Abadan are resisting the Iraqi siege. Fourteen-year-old Omid is thinking with his grandfather about how to help people escape if the enemy seizes the town. They find an abandoned sailing boat in the harbour, which they now need to repair.

programme.title: Un Week-End
programme.desc: For 10 year-old Hector, the coming weekend is certain to be a very special one. He's about to meet his father, someone he hardly knows, and spend two days and two nights with him.

programme.title: Mere De Ma Mere
programme.desc: Confronted with the emotional difficulties of a mother in distress, 12 year-old Djenaba, takes on a parental role to protect her.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 18
programme.desc: Anemone sees her neurologist again and the empathy expressed by Dr Mancini pushes her to reveal things she had never said to anyone else. Maryse decides to keep Vincent in his job in Belleville, much to the disappointment of Lise, who decides to gamble everything in one last attempt.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 19
programme.desc: Anemone is playing with fire by daring to return to the property where she had lived with Ron and their children. The results of Caroline's genetic test are ready. Lise surprises her colleagues at the funeral parlour by announcing a major decision.

programme.desc: Loneliness is a growing concern among people around the world, and Asian women are no exception. programme.title: Movie - Kaththi Sandai
programme.desc: Arjun plays modern-day Robin Hood when he steals money from two corrupt government officials and uses it to develop the remote village he hails from.

programme.title: Movie - Evano Oruvan
programme.desc: Sridhar has to deal with widespread corruption in all walks of life. A stray incident triggers inside him a reaction that may cost him more than the two rupees he initially tries to protest against.

programme.title: Movie - Killadi Mappillai
programme.desc: Rajaram rejects the girl chosen by his father since he loves Shanthi. However, he must first take up the herculean task of impressing Shanthi's parents so that they will permit him to marry her.

programme.title: Movie - Uyarnthavan
programme.desc: This film is directed by Ashokram, and stars Ramki and Shanthipriya in the lead roles, with music by Gangai Amaran.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kannukku Kannaga
programme.desc: Devi is afraid to tell her brother that she loves Arun. On learning about their relationship, he agrees to the marriage, but an astrologer predicts that he will die if Devi gives birth to a male child.

programme.title: Movie - Kilinjalgal
programme.desc: Babu's friend Jana helps him woo a girl not knowing that she is Julie, the same girl he himself loves. All goes well, until Julie's family disapproves of Babu and fixes her marriage with James.

programme.title: Movie - Deiva Vaakku
programme.desc: Hamsaveni's divine power earns her respect among the villagers, whereas her brother Vallatharai tries to exploit her power for his personal gain. He goes to the extent of sabotaging her marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Sudhanthiram
programme.desc: Two brothers, who always look out for each other, start working for a gangster after their father's death. But both of them get into a conflict when the younger one decides to testify against the gangster for a murder he committed.

programme.title: Movie - Iruttu
programme.desc: A police officer investigates the mystery behind unnatural deaths after taking charge of his new post at a hill station.

programme.title: Movie - Love Birds
programme.desc: Mridula relocates abroad as she is devastated after her lover Arun's death. However, she meets a man who looks exactly like Arun and tries to find his true identity.

programme.title: Movie - Mappillai Vandachu
programme.desc: Mappillai Vanthachu is a Tamil feature film starring Gautami, Rashin Rahman, Chinni Jayanth and Goundamani.

programme.title: Movie - Vaazhndu Kattuvom
programme.desc: This movie stars Ramki, Gautami and Chinni Jayanth, and is directed by R Krishnamurthy.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Pillaikkaga
programme.desc: Pillaikkaga is a 1989 Indian Tamil-language action film written and directed by P. Vasu, produced by Mohan Natarajan and Tharangai V. Shanmugam under Rajakaliamman Pictures, starring Prabhu, Gautami, Nassar and Rekha.

programme.title: Movie - Thaaikulamae Thaaikulamae
programme.desc: While on a business tour, circumstances force a married man to marry another woman. However, his first wife happens to learn about his second marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Gopurangal Saivathillai
programme.desc: Mohan is forced to marry Arukkani, an illiterate village girl. Disappointed, he develops a secret relationship with a modern girl. But problems follow when he repents.

programme.title: Movie - Businessman
programme.desc: A highly-ambitious man comes to Mumbai with the idea of ruling the city. He turns into a local gangster and goes on to become a powerful businessman, whose intentions are not what they seem.

programme.title: Movie - Kaappan
programme.desc: A special agent is assigned to protect the Indian prime minister who later gets assassinated. Following this, he is tasked with finding the man or group responsible for the assassination.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Queen’s Club in London plays host to the HSBC Championships - with the tour returning to the annual tournament at the WTA 500-level after more than 50 years. The stunning outdoor venue in West Kensington is known for holding this long-standing annual grass court event, which was first played in 1889.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. From traditional events such as marathons, triathlons and cycling events to the newer formats of obstacle races such as Spartan Race and themed events like Hello Kitty Run and The Color Run, these races are regularly attracting participants en masse.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group C: USA vs Denmark
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: HSBC BWF World Tour 2025

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW07 Brighton and Hove Albion v Tottenham Hotspur
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 06 OCT
programme.desc: Highlights of all the fixtures from Matchweek 7 of the Premier League. With Everton hosting Newcastle United at Goodison Park, and Brighton taking on Spurs to close off the weekend's action.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'The Entertainers', Kevin Keegan's Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. In this show, we speak to those that were part of that incredible journey and reflect on some of those unforgettable moments that captured hearts and forever changing the club's legacy.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 4
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Brennan Johnson, Matheus Cunha, Bernd Leno, Diogo Dalot and Ipswich Town goals recreated.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 5
programme.desc: Premier League legend Tim Howard takes on the ultimate challenge, ranking the 10 greatest US players to play in the Premier League. But there's a twist; from his carefully selected list, he must crown one as the Ultimate Premier League USA GOAT.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 5

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 48
programme.desc: Reggae Rhythms in the Premier League explores the powerful connection between Jamaica and the world's most-watched football league, showcasing how the island's culture, music, and style have influenced the Premier League. We feature iconic Jamaican players who have left their mark, while also diving into the impact of reggae music, fashion, and fan culture on the game.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 31
programme.desc: After a nomadic start to his career, it now seems that Pervis Estupinan has found his footballing home at Brighton & Hove Albion. The Ecuadorian international takes The Big Interview to the beachfront where he talks about influence of a former professional in the family while growing up, how playing in Spain helped him to become the Premier League performer he is today and his excitement for the future playing under Fabian Hurzeler.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW07 Brighton and Hove Albion v Tottenham Hotspur
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 2
programme.desc: We chart the rise of Portuguese star Rúben Dias, from his early days in Portugal to the heart of Manchester City's defence. We meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his journey, offering a rare glimpse into the upbringing and mindset that forged a Premier League leader. Then, in Manchester, Rúben reflects on his career so far, his impact at City, and the values that continue to drive him on.

programme.desc: PL Stories delves into the nail-biting relegation 'Great Escapes' in Premier League History. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: TF2 - The Fighter
programme.desc: In this episode the fighters compete in a physical challenge to earn a day trip to a spa. With only two days to prepare, Greece's Christina Stelliou faces off against the UK-based Romanian Alice Ardelean that will determine who will continue on in the competition.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Tbilisi, Georgia, where judo is one of the most popular sports in the country.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Daieisho, Terunofuji and Shodai.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Weapons Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: TF2 - The Fighter
programme.desc: In this episode the fighters compete in a physical challenge to earn a day trip to a spa. With only two days to prepare, Greece's Christina Stelliou faces off against the UK-based Romanian Alice Ardelean that will determine who will continue on in the competition.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "The Dream Match" of Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya that raked in $70 million in Pay-per-view revenue and launched Pacquiao into global stardom. Also on the card, action from a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Themba Gorimbo vs. Luke Michael
programme.desc: This episode features Themba 'The Answer' Gorimbo and Luke 'Young Gun' Michael battling for the vacant welterweight championship. Vicious ground and pound ends this fight before the end of Round 1. Bonus coverage includes Sizwe Mnikathi vs. August Kayambala.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 102
programme.desc: Po eats Tubby Custard and gets a messy bib. Po washes the bib clean and hangs it out to dry before eating more Tubby Custard with Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 8
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'h', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see a helicopter, look inside a house and hug a hamster!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Zip thinks Phoebe could be a superhero, so they craft some awesome superhero cuffs.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: Messy gets to fly Mayor Oki's plane, but he crash-lands it in a tree! Luckily, robots fly to the rescue.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 36
programme.desc: Judo desperately wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she is not supposed to get herself dirty.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 35
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want Dad all to themselves and will not let Mum have a smoochy kiss. They try to hide him all around the house, but Mum is desperate to spend a little romance time with her husband.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Meet Duggee, a big lovable dog who runs 'The Squirrel Club'; an activity club for pre-schoolers that inspires children to have fun, be energetic, and - most of all - to do things!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Meet Duggee, a big lovable dog who runs 'The Squirrel Club'; an activity club for pre-schoolers that inspires children to have fun, be energetic, and - most of all - to do things!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 26
programme.desc: Inside Bingo's dream, Bingo and Floppy have an intergalactic adventure, while the rest of her sleep-deprived family try to navigate Bingo's non-stop night-time bedhopping.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 25
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Andy head's to the flooded forests of North America to find some wood duck chicks.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: A little boy called Leo needs Sylvie's help performing his magic trick at show and tell.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie head into the heat of the jungle enclosure to meet a jewel of the jungle, the golden-headed lion tamarin. Next, Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet up with another colourful animal, the poison dart frog. These frogs come in many amazing colours

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 24

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10) - EP 15
programme.desc: The team is ecstatic when new scientific evidence narrows down the location of the gold signature in the Money Pit. Rick realises a lifelong dream when he finally goes underground on Oak Island.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: An elite team investigates the mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle aided by a secret map decades in the making. They attempt to unravel the mystery of why 27 US Navy aviators and crew vanished in 1945.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5) - EP 14
programme.desc: After the team's final experiment of the year, stunning revelations are made all across Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14) - EP 217

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15) - EP 225

programme.desc: Confidence grows when irrefutable scientific evidence reports the Fellowship is closer than ever to the gold.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1) - EP 6

programme.title: How Disney Built America - EP 4
programme.desc: Amidst financial troubles, Disney hires an ingenious marketing whiz who helps them figure out how to bring their beloved characters off the screen and into the hands of millions.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: The spirit of a departed child leaves its handprint on a couple's mirror. A ghost takes control of a willing paranormal investigator's neck. A woman spots what appears to be a mermaid in a local lake.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 90
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 115
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business (2025) - EP 78
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Great Barrier Reef S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Extending over 2000km, the Great Barrier Reef is a complex system. Aaron Pedersen explains that its beauty is just one of many amazing features that makes this natural wonder so important.

programme.title: The First Inventors S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Could you survive in Australia 65,000 years ago? From engineering volcanic landscapes into fish farms to mastering deadly fire, the unique survival inventions that let First Nations people thrive.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: We join one of the first women to qualify as a surf instructor in the Solomon Islands as Nagarita and her team use their passion for surfing to empower girls by challenging stereotypes about men and women.

programme.title: Australian Story (2025) - EP 16
programme.desc: At the peak of his career, legendary Australian football manager Ange Postecoglou speaks exclusively to Australian Story about Tottenham Hotspur's stunning Europa League victory and says he's still dreaming big.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 90
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 116
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 116
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 116
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 16
programme.desc: The challenges of green hydrogen technology in WA; and microbes boosting soil health and pasture production in dairy country.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 49
programme.desc: Stirred is the word as two top chefs, Federica Andrisani of FICO Hobart and Warren Mendes of Food Trail: South Africa join Adam to make food stirred with love.

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 19
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 18
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Sitting in the hot seat is new host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Look around you. Rubber is everywhere now, but it wasn't always this way. Marc Fennell takes you deep into the Amazon jungle to unravel an elaborate botanical heist that changed the world.

programme.title: Dream Gardens S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Artist Meredith Gaston and her husband Kevin Lindemann want a modern landscape to surround their house in Victoria's Mount Eliza. Instead, they have a neglected 40-year-old garden full of weeds and disease riddled trees.

programme.title: Art Works S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: We meet Sidney Nolan by way of artist Dean Cross, visit Powerhouse Ultimo's exhibition Eucalyptusdom, as it interrogates colonial narratives, and find out about the playful self-portraits of textile artist Adrienne Doig.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 98
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Why We Ride

programme.title: Autoday
programme.desc: Automotive Program that discusses old cars from specs to storiesbehind the car. Also displays information about the car that is discussed the details of the device from home and abroad. Plus the public voxpop about the car being discussed. Packed in interesting themes.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S4
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S1
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk

programme.title: Sport's Tale

programme.title: Beyond The Limit S2
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Autoday
programme.desc: Automotive Program that discusses old cars from specs to storiesbehind the car. Also displays information about the car that is discussed the details of the device from home and abroad. Plus the public voxpop about the car being discussed. Packed in interesting themes.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S1
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S4
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S1
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Catch that spy - EP 42
programme.desc: The host leads the guests to challenge the game. The game is fun and full of wits. The good guys and spies fight for the prize money, and the suspenseful atmosphere brings the audience a new and different experience!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1582
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 519
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 282
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: No.57 Dream Boulevard - EP 1721
programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: The Best Chef's Table - EP 22
programme.desc: Cooking reality show!Local foodie EmersonTsai will help everyone discover the cooking secrets of famous dishes.The cooking tips that famous chefs don't want to tell others; the amazing young chef Zhang Ting-hu instant gourmet replicas!Allowing viewers to easily recreate the chef's table at home!

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1050
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: The Legend of Young Justice Bao - EP 11
programme.desc: The story tells about various bizarre mysteries such as "Blood Soul Forest", "Pouling Town", and "Ghost Valley" that Bao Zheng experienced in his youth on his way to Beijing to rush to the exam.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 643
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1970
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 26
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Our Graduation Ceremony - EP 5
programme.desc: Professor Ma Hengri (Ma Junwei), a former director turned educator, and his assistant Kelly Kwan (Tang Baoru) guide students through challenges like family issues, academic pressure, bullying, and self-worth.

programme.title: Our Graduation Ceremony - EP 6
programme.desc: Professor Ma Hengri (Ma Junwei), a former director turned educator, and his assistant Kelly Kwan (Tang Baoru) guide students through challenges like family issues, academic pressure, bullying, and self-worth.

programme.title: Kill My Sins - EP 9
programme.desc: Set during the era of Emperor Tang Zhongzong, the story follows Gu Qing, the orphaned survivor of a renowned medical family. Under the alias Ye Ping'an (Liu Shishi), she embarks on a journey of vengeance.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1971
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 34
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 35
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 12
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 10
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 1
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 8
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhou’s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 7
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 8

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 10
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.
